Sidekick.js

A modern opinionated web backend for rapid prototyping.

Sidekick leverages Postgres as the center of your web application. REST API, GraphQL, Authorization, Background Workers will all be handled by Postgres. You can extend web pages by placing them inside the ./custom/pages folder.

Thats it.'}} {{> box svg='' title='User Management' body='Includes a general user system which is extendable for your use case.'}} {{> box svg='' title='Async Background Worker' body='Execute async javascript functions on database changes.'}} {{> box svg='' title='Row Level Security' body='Embedded securty directly from postgres.
